overview: The trendier-than-thou Bratz girls - Yasmin, Chloe, Jade, and Sasha - return for four more fashion-packed animated adventures. In 'Pet Show' the girls enter their furry friends in the International Pet Show, only to find out that there's a pet-napper on the loose... Episodes comprise: 'Pet Show', 'Truth Or Dare', 'Manicuring Candidate' and 'It's Not About Me Week'.
title: Bratz Pet Show
